Berserk:




"I am Berserk," he said to Dark Mouse, keeping his grip on her. "What 
planet this is?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> She didn't move back in and felt his sword cut her chest.  She 
> dropped her gun and cried out. The wound healed in momemnts.  She 
> reached up with her hands and held onto his wrist as he grabbed her 
> throat.  She struggled as her head and back hit the wall.  Slightly 
> dazed, she scratched at his hand and arm as he held her.
> In a stratchy voice,"Your in the predacon council's base. Who are 
> you?" she said looking into his eyes.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> > Berserk:
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > Berserk snarled as the shot from Dark Mouse hit his shoulder, 
> fraying 
> > off some of the artificial furs from it. She called stand down, 
> > something that told him to stop attacking, but she was a 
stranger. 
> He 
> > went on with the attack. He slashed at her with his sword just to 
> > scare her, then grabbed her around the neck with his free hand. 
He 
> > spun around and slammed her back into the wall.
> > 
> > "Where am I?" he demanded. 
> > 
> > (Just a reminder, Berserk is a clone of Megatron except his armor 
> is 
> > different.)
